statements: UPDATE website_visitors SET ip_address = '192.168.1.100', visited_page = 'homepage', visit_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00', referral_source = 'Google' WHERE visitor_id = 1;

UPDATE Pages SET visit_count = visit_count + 1 WHERE page_title = 'Homepage';
